examples: And talk about that, his community service.
This is the logic behind assigning community service to offenders.
And he became as known for his business acumen, his community service, as he did for his music.
Anna Morgan-Lloyd received three years of federal probation, plus community service, for a single misdemeanor.
He got caught in a burglary and his sentence was community service, until: MIGUEL RAMIREZ:
words.defineEn: unpaid work done either as a form of punishment by a felon or as a voluntary service by a citizen
words.defineVi: công việc không được trả lương được thực hiện như một hình thức trừng phạt của một kẻ phạm trọng tội hoặc như một nghĩa vụ tự nguyện của một công dân

examples: Activities range from trapeze and freefall to archery and motorsports.
What's your favorite evening activity?
The whole house was a hive of activity on the day before the wedding.
There's a lot of police activity around here lately.
Italy's Mediterranean climate and diverse geography offer a wide range of outdoor activities
words.defineEn: something that a person spends time doing, particularly to accomplish a certain purpose
words.defineVi: một cái gì đó mà một người dành thời gian làm, đặc biệt là để hoàn thành một mục đích nhất định

examples: And hardware tools are used to beautify houses.
Makeup is used to beautify faces.
words.defineEn: to make something more beautiful or attractive, typically by adding decoration or enhancing its appearance
words.defineVi: để làm cho một cái gì đó đẹp hơn hoặc hấp dẫn hơn, thường bằng cách thêm trang trí hoặc tăng cường vẻ ngoài của nó

examples: The town is three miles away.
The rebels held the town for many weeks.
The French army held the town for three days.
Posters for the gig appeared all over town.
I know this town like the back of my hand.
words.defineEn: an area with human population that is smaller than a city and larger than a village
words.defineVi: một khu vực có dân số nhỏ hơn một thành phố và lớn hơn một ngôi làng

words.defineEn: to make oneself neat or clean
words.defineVi: để làm cho mình gọn gàng hoặc sạch sẽ

examples: The puppies in the litter are like two peas in a pod.
She was silent for a while, lost in thought, staring at the books littering the room.
Well, cats have big litters.
Is this kitty litter?
The nomadic Scythians littered the steppes with grave mounds known as kurgans.
words.defineEn: waste such as bottles, papers, etc. that people throw on a sidewalk, park, or other public place
words.defineVi: chất thải như chai lọ, giấy, v.v. mà mọi người vứt trên vỉa hè, công viên hoặc nơi công cộng khác

examples: The bank raised interest rates.
Many shops have raised their prices.
The piece raises the ghosts of a number of twentieth-century art ideas.
The book raises many important questions.
Local residents have raised concerns about late-night noise.
words.defineEn: to assemble money or resources, particularly in order to achieve or create something
words.defineVi: để thu thập tiền hoặc tài nguyên, đặc biệt là để đạt được hoặc tạo ra một cái gì đó

examples: The business is losing money.
Money can't buy happiness.
Money means nothing to him.
A lot of people give money to good causes.
My parents give me pocket money every week.
words.defineEn: something that people use to buy and sell goods and services, can be in the form of coins or paper bills
words.defineVi: thứ mà mọi người sử dụng để mua và bán hàng hóa và dịch vụ, có thể ở dạng tiền xu hoặc hóa đơn giấy

examples: The volunteers worked together to collect donations for the local food drive.
The volunteers' organizing of the charity event was a labour of love.
She volunteers at the town library to help with organizing books.
I volunteer at the preschool to help with art activities and storytime.
Jake actually volunteered to do the dishes after dinner?
words.defineEn: to state or suggest something without being asked or told
words.defineVi: để nhà nước hoặc đề nghị một cái gì đó mà không được yêu cầu hoặc nói

examples: Things like this take time.
Time is moving on.
The time passed quickly.
Time to bust a move.
The contractor is really taking their time.
words.defineEn: the quantity that is measured in seconds, minutes, hours, etc. using a device like clock
words.defineVi: số lượng được đo bằng giây, phút, giờ, v.v. bằng thiết bị như đồng hồ

examples: She donated money to a charity to help those in need.
Mary had a vested interest in the outcome of the election, so she donated money to her candidate's campaign.
We donate blood regularly at the hospital to help those in need.
They donated canned food to the local food bank.
Please do your part by donating what you can to the organization.
words.defineEn: to freely give goods, money, or food to someone or somewhere such as a charity
words.defineVi: tự do tặng hàng hóa, tiền bạc hoặc thức ăn cho ai đó hoặc nơi nào đó chẳng hạn như tổ chức từ thiện

examples: A white blouse will show the blood.
Blue blood is no guarantee of any particular merit, competence, or expertise.
The nurse takes my blood pressure.
My aunt and I are related by blood.
The heart pumps blood throughout the body to provide oxygen and nutrients.
words.defineEn: the red liquid that the heart pumps through the body, carrying oxygen to and carbon dioxide from the tissues
words.defineVi: chất lỏng màu đỏ mà tim bơm qua cơ thể, mang oxy đến và carbon dioxide từ các mô
